name: The wicked adventures of Bob the Rob(ot) who got lost but had everything he needed
name_original: The wicked adventures of Bob the Rob(ot) who got lost but had everything he needed
description:
My game for the VGDC Fall Jam 2021

Theme: "Everything we need is already here"

Go on an adventure with Bob the Robot. Jump stuff and mind the Spikey-Spikeys.

A little bit of a fourth-wall break I hope. I'm tired.
